## ValidationFunctionData

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/legacy/src/loadLegacyValidations.ts" sourceLine="56" packageName="@commandkit/legacy" />

Represents a validation function that can be loaded from a file.
It includes the name of the validation, the path to the file, and the validation function itself.

```ts title="Signature"
interface ValidationFunctionData {
    name: string;
    path: string;
    validate: ValidationFunction;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### name

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The name of the validation function.
### path

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path to the file where the validation function is defined.
### validate

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/legacy/types/validation-function#validationfunction'>ValidationFunction</a>`}   />

The validation function.


</div>
